channel.title: The stuff we assume about the way things are
channel.description: The stuff we assume about the way things are

item.title: The Immanent Frame
item.description:
The Immanent Frame

The following is excerpted from Nancy Levene's forthcoming book, Powers of Distinction: Religion and Modernity x Two.-Eds. In a recent piece in The New York Times' column The Stone, philosophers Jay L. Garfield and Bryan W. Van Norden lament the blindness of contemporary philosophy departments towards cultures outside the West.
